text: Time Waits for No Slave is the thirteenth studio album by the British grindcore band Napalm Death. It was released through Century Media on 23 January 2009. == Track listing == ==Personnel== ===Napalm Death=== * Mark Greenway – vocals * Mitch Harris – guitar, vocals * Shane Embury – bass, vocals * Danny Herrera – drums ===Production=== * Napalm Death – arrangement, producer * Russ Russell – producer, engineering, mixing, mastering * Mick Kenney – outside illustration * Kevin Sharp – inside illustration * Carsten Drescher – layout * Hugo Chevalier – band photo (Herrera) * ccphotoart.biz – band photos (other band members) ==Chart positions== {| class = "wikitable plainrowheaders sortable" border="1" ! Chart (2009) ! Peak position |- | |- | |- | |} ==References== Category:2009 albums Category:Napalm Death albums Category:Century Media Records albums
title: Time Waits for No Slave
